title: Chef-Tiu
description: POS Website created with React.js and Laravel using Minimals template. Handles transactions for ordering meals and setting up reservations.

title: Elektro-Knicks
description: A sample e-commerce site created with MERN that allows the user to purchase outdated technology. Comes with an Admin Panel.

title: Meow Tapper
description: An android game made in Java using Android Studio. This game is a clicker game with a cat theme inspired by other clicker games such as Cookie Clicker.
